BG3 Eldricth Knight Build: Blazing Battlemage

BG3 Eldritch Knight Tips & Builds

Although the Eldritch Knight has spells, focusing on buff spells is best, it is unusual for your save to be high, so mage armor (if you are DEX based), shield, long strider, Enhance Leap and Expeditious Retreat are all good choices for level 1. The Eldritch Kn
